channel.title: Piston Elevator (My First Attempt)
channel.description: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z2uYR0DXQIA[/youtube] My first ever go at making an elevator not good but still okay sorry for poor quality not really familiar with video making Thanks for watching :D

item.title: Piston Elevator (My First Attempt)
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“317guy, post:10, topic:429855”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=532538.msg3903761#msg3903761 date=1328029338]

Youtube rule 1: IF you show a piece of TNT in a video you HAVE to BLOW it UP.

I was going to do a trigger to detonate it then i though fuck that i would have 2 put on 15-20 delays
[/quote]No, the only thing you should have done is flick the goddamn lever

Calm down ill make a video with tnt then…[/quote]You better…

Read full topic

item.title: Piston Elevator (My First Attempt)
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

CoonHunter:

Hmm, you should put up a small tut on how it works. I never bothered with elevators, I’m more of a complex lock builder. Just recently made a programmable 127 lever lock. Of course my luck was not realizing when I would get on with 1.1 all of the wiring would be broken (glowstone). CBA wiring it again yet lol.

Thatt must suck. ^^ I was thinking of makeing a tutorial its just the video tens to get blurry when i move arround for a bit…

[quote=“triston001, post:5, topic:429855”]elevaters are somewhat simmple, all u need to do is have psycronizing on redstone wiring that push u up. i had made a piston elevater that pusshes u up 2 stories, it can get down immediatly by clicking the shut off button for it.[/quote] Yes but i wanted to make one that goes down and up in the push of a single button. Followed by a small time delay so u dont have to run straight towards it.

Read full topic

item.title: Piston Elevator (My First Attempt)
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

elevaters are somewhat simmple, all u need to do is have psycronizing on redstone wiring that push u up. i had made a piston elevater that pusshes u up 2 stories, it can get down immediatly by clicking the shut off button for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Piston Elevator (My First Attempt)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Hmm, you should put up a small tut on how it works. I never bothered with elevators, I’m more of a complex lock builder. Just recently made a programmable 127 lever lock. Of course my luck was not realizing when I would get on with 1.1 all of the wiring would be broken (glowstone). CBA wiring it again yet lol.
